title: Dame resigns with Portland and Killer Mike joins the show!
description:
Jalen and Jacoby are back after a quick vacation to discuss Damian Lillard resigning with the Trailblazers, the Pistons rookies impressing in Summer League, and address some rumors about a certain New York quarterback, all that and more!
